oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Labor Spy Network #2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Businesses
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: LaFollette Committee reviewing union rolls for spies. Second Panel: Company-hired strike breakers with guns. Third Panel: Guards confronting striking workers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
